workzen.xgen.test.persistence
Class LobTypeBean

java.lang.Object
  workzen.xgen.test.persistence.LobTypeBean

public class LobTypeBean
extends java.lang.Object

Demonstration for blob and clob types. Blobs and Clobs are not implemented by all vendors.

Author:
Brad Matlack

persist

public void persist(java.sql.Connection conn)
             throws java.sql.SQLException
Persist the record. Performs a sql update or insert. The primary key will be "set" upon insert. If autocommit is on, turn it off to make a transactional check of the tcn field.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
